original_text: When you look up at the sky, you see the sun, the moon and the stars. They all shine up in the sky. But do not bend down low to them or worship them. They are there because the Lord your God has made them. He has given them to people everywhere in the world.
korean_text: 또 그리하여 네가 하늘을 향하여 눈을 들어 해와 달과 별들, 하늘 위의 모든 천체 곧 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 천하 만민을 위하여 배정하신 것을 보고 미혹하여 그것에 경배하며 섬기지 말라

sentences.original_text: When you look up at the sky,
They all shine up in the sky.
But do not bend down low to them
because the Lord your God has made them.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 그것들을 만드셨기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: to people everywhere in the world.
sentences.korean_translation: 온 세상에 있는 모든 사람들에게 주신 것이다.
